Description: FRagment of lower lip, cul and handle of early Chian patterned pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed (fired red); exterior reserved, but very worn; thin brown band above handle and black on handle and around handle root; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0330) (phase 2)
